snippet: The victims were mostly young men returning to their villages for Id al-Fitr, the Islamic festival that marks the end of Ramadan.
abstract: Pakistani Taliban militants pull 22 Shiites off buses and gun them down in a remote mountain pass in northern Pakistan, in the latest iteration of attacks targeting religious minorities.
lead_paragraph: The victims were mostly young men returning to their villages for Id al-Fitr, the Islamic festival that marks the end of Ramadan.

headline.seo: Pakistani Taliban Kill 22 Shiites in Remote Area
headline.main: Pakistani Taliban Kill 22 Shiites in Bus Attack
headline.print_headline: Taliban Gun Down 22 Shiites Pulled Off Buses in Remote Northern Pakistan
